title: Top Google Searches In 2014 Include Robin Williams, Jennifer Lawrence
teaser: Google’s annual "Zeitgeist" report of search terms was just released, revealing the most-searched-for words, stories and people.
contentencoded:
Google’s annual “Zeitgeist” report of trending search terms was just released, revealing the most-searched-for stories, people and things in the last year.

Topping the list of searches both nationally and globally Robin Williams, who died in August. Jennifer Lawrence of “Hunger Games” was the most searched-for actress — and is the most searched-for person on the planet.

  • See more on the year in search via Google
